Researchers have described at least three types of Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome. The types, which are numbered 1 through 3, are distinguished by their genetic cause.",GHR,Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome
How many people are affected by Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome ?,"Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome has an estimated prevalence of 1 in 200,000 people.",GHR,Axenfeld-Rieger syndrome
